coref: A Lion and an Ass agreed to go hunting together. In A Lion and an Ass search for game the hunters saw the Goats run into a cave, and laid plans to catch the hunters. an Ass was to go into a cave and drive the Goats out, while Lion would stand at the entrance to strike the Goats down. The plan worked beautifully. an Ass an Ass made such a frightful din in a cave, kicking and braying with all an Ass might, that the Goats came running out in a panic of fear, only to fall victim to Lion. an Ass came proudly out of a cave. Did you see how I made them run?,he said. Yes, indeed, answered LionLion, and if I had not known you and your kind I should certainly have run, too.
